title: Anyone have a Jimmy Bannon N300 for sale?
author: biggies

posts.post_title: Anyone have a Jimmy Bannon N300 for sale?
posts.post_content:
It's the only vintage namesake card I could have and I've always wanted one.

Thanks, Bob Bannon
I have this one available for $255 delivered...

[quote name="biggies" post=1713884]It's the only vintage namesake card I could have and I've always wanted one.

Thanks, Bob Bannon[/QUOTE]



Bob - you are lucky to have even one.  Not only did I not have a pre-war namesake, but had to settle for, in post-war era, 'Ray Culp' to have anything close.

I'm glad Leon has a Bannon for you...congrats!

-Raymond
Sold. How do I pay you, and thanks!

[quote name="biggies" post=1716460]Thanks Chris and Ray[/QUOTE]

Last time you left for a week without responding to this thread. So are you interested in the one I showed or something else? I won't hold my breath.
 Hint- when you post a want on this BST you might come back and check in less than a week. We are old but not that old. :)

Sorry, I'm a rookie here, I did send you an email, I think. Let me know how to pay you.

thanks, Bob

[quote name="biggies" post=1716730]Sorry, I'm a rookie here, I did send you an email, I think. Let me know how to pay you.

thanks, Bob[/QUOTE]

No worries, I didn't receive an email. Send paypal to [url]leonl@flash.net[/url] and then private message me your address.....or if it's on the paypal that is fine. thanks

btw, you don't post much but have been a member since 2010. You were a rookie 7 yrs ago. C'mon man, get your head in the game :)....

Well you are right of course. I'm more of a Roy Hobbs, had to leave the game for a while.

Money has been sent and thanks very much.

Bob

[quote name="biggies" post=1717033]Well you are right of course. I'm more of a Roy Hobbs, had to leave the game for a while.

Money has been sent and thanks very much.

Bob[/QUOTE]

Thanks for the payment. I have your address to ship to.   I will get it out on Tuesday or Wednesday....thanks much!!
